summary: A test suite for the oesophageal cancer simulation module, containing helper utilities to configure simulations with various health system and treatment settings, manipulate disease onset and progression rates, set initial prevalence, and verify that disease progression and treatment effects behave as expected.
business_intent: Validate the correctness of the oesophageal cancer model under different configurations, ensuring that prevalence initialization, disease stage progression, and treatment effectiveness are accurately represented in the simulation.
